CustomField.description:
Updated via Polytomic Contact Status sync. Used to trigger updates to Contact Status when there are changes to the number of open Opportunities on the related Account.
External Systems Utilization: Polytomic
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Updated via Polytomic Contact Status sync.. Used to trigger updates to Contact Status when there are changes to the number of open Opportunities on the related Account.
CustomField.label: # Open Committed Opporunities
